page.title: 11FARMING Local Farm cont.
page.content: {Winkhill Farm continued { We saw some wild bees which had a hive in an old fallen down tree.I got stung by a bee in the neck.We saw an old sundial which had come from the walls of the old manor house.It was an hour slow.It works when the sun shines on the sundial and the shadow of the hand moves.Winkhill Farm has got three tractors.There was a shed where you throw bales of straw from a trailer.In the garden we saw a ha-ha which is a wall which goes down and there was a ditch with grass at the bottom.It is to stop cattle from getting on the garden and it gives a good view of the cattle and the fields.
